1.text: Grab 2 or more friends who are ready to play.

2.text: Pick up a standard deck of 52 cards.

3.text: Find some space with a flat surface.

4.text: Explain the game goal of racing to collect a hand totaling 31 points.

5.text: Agree on card values and scoring.

6.text: Select a dealer by cutting the deck.

8.text: Deal to the left, placing 1 card face down in front of every player in a clockwise rotation.

9.text: Place 3 cards face up in the middle to create the window.

12.text: Begin play with the player to the left of the dealer.

13.text: Play continues in a clockwise fashion.

14.text: Asses your competition's emotions as you play.

15.text: Knock when you believe your hand has reached its greatest potential.

16.text: Begin the showdown by revealing your cards to the group.

17.text: Declare the lowest scorer as loser.

18.text: Declare the highest scorer as winner.

19.text: Declare the last player standing as winner of the game.
